amathyansha, departhamenthu, wenath yam nishchitha aayathana, komishan sabha, sanstha, rajaya ho rajya sansthawak ho palath palana aayathanayak wisin ehi kotaswalin siyayata panahak ho eeta wadi pramanayak darana sama samagamak aadi wiwidha aayathana sambandhayen pradhana ganan dime niladhariya wisin wiganakadhipathiwaraya wetha idiripath kalayuthu warshika wisarjana ginum, aadayam ginum saha aththikaram ginumda athulu mulya prakashada warshika karya sadhana warthada aadiya pilibandawa me yatathe wistharathmaka widhiwidhana salasa atha. 19 wana aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaye ingrisi anuwadaye dakwunu namuth sinhala pitapathe athulathwa nothibima nisa arbudayakwa mathuwunu rajya sansthawak wisin ehi kotaswalin siyayata panahak ho eeta wadi pramanayak darana sama samagamaka wigananaya wiganakadhipathiwaraya wetha pawarima sambandhayen wu aniyathathawada ihatha widhiwidhana magin nirawulwa thibimath ihatha sandahan boho ginum katayuthu methekkal kisidu parlimenthu panathakin aawaranaya nokara thibime doshayath meya thulin yam pramanayakata widhimath kara thibima wishesha kota agaya kala yuthuwa atha.
